title: World's first gigafactory for pure solid-state batteries established in Switzerland
notes:
Location:
- The project is located in Frauenfeld, Switzerland.

Capacity:
- The production scaling is planned from 1.2 GWh to 7.6 GWh, with the first phase aiming to manufacture 1.2 GWh of battery cells per year.

Investment amounts:
- In the first phase, the planned investment volume in machinery is 246 million CHF, with a targeted sales of CHF 318 million. The enterprise value in this phase is CHF 1.3 billion. An IPO is targeted for October 2022 on the Zurich Stock Exchange.
- In the final phase, the investment sum is planned to be CHF 775 million, with a turnover of over CHF 2 billion. The company will then be worth CHF 8.6 billion.

Project progress:
- The company was founded in February 2022 and is planning to start production from 2024.

Project type:
- The project is a new build, with the production facility being scaled from 1.2 GWh to 7.6 GWh.

Value chain stages:
- The facility covers the stages of cell fabrication, as it aims to manufacture battery cells.

Please let me know if there is anything else you would like to add or modify!

title: Swiss startup wants to make the first clean battery
notes:
Location:
- Switzerland

Capacity:
- The initial production capacity is planned to be 1.2 GWh, which will subsequently scale to 7.6 GWh.

Investment amounts:
- The company plans to invest CHF 246 million in machinery for the first phase of production, with a planned sales of CHF 318 million ($340 million). Additionally, the company will invest $263.6 million (241.5 million euros) in the machinery for the first phase of production.

Project progress:
- The project is planned to start production in 2024, with an initial production phase of 1.2 GWh. The company has announced the employment of 181 people for this phase and the construction of a production area of 20,000 m2 to manufacture 7.2 million battery cells per year.

Project type:
- New build gigafactory for sustainable solid-state batteries.

Value chain stages:
- The facility will cover the stages of cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly.

title: Swiss Clean Battery plans 7.6-GWh gigafactory
notes:
Location:
- The battery production project is located in Switzerland, with the head office in Frauenfeld near Zurich.

Capacity:
- The initial production capacity of the factory is planned to be 1.2 GWh, which will eventually be scaled up to 7.6 GWh.

Investment amounts:
- Swiss Clean Battery AG will invest CHF 246 million (USD 263.6m/EUR 241.5m) in machinery for the first production phase. The company plans to go public on the stock market in Zurich in October 2022 to fund its plans.

Project progress:
- The company was established in February, and the factory is planned to open in 2024. The production area will be expanded to about 100,000 sq m from 20,000 sq m in the initial phase.

Project type:
- The project is a new build, as the company is establishing a factory for sustainable solid-state batteries.

Value chain stages:
- The facility will cover the stages of cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly for the production of solid-state batteries.

title: SCB to build gigafactory for pure solid-state batteries in Switzerland
notes:
Location:
- The battery production project is located in Switzerland.

Capacity:
- The production capacity at the facility is planned to scale from 1.2GWh to 7.6GWh.

Investment amounts:
- For the first production phase of 1.2GWh, the company plans sales of CHF318m ($340.7m) and intends to invest CHF246m ($263.5m) in machinery, while employing 181 people.
- The investment involved in the final phase of the gigafactory, aiming to produce 7.6GWh, is CHF775m ($830m) with a targeted turnover of more than CHF2bn ($2.1bn).

Project progress:
- The company plans to target an initial public offering (IPO) for October 2022 on the Zurich Stock Exchange.
- The final stage of expansion is expected to result in an enterprise value worth CHF8.6bn ($9.2bn).

Project type:
- The project is a new build, with the company planning to establish a gigafactory for pure solid-state batteries in Switzerland.

Value chain stages:
- The facility will cover the stages of cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly.

title: Swiss Clean Battery to open world’s first solid-state battery plant
notes:
Location:
- The project is located in Frauenfeld, Switzerland.

Capacity:
- The first production phase will deliver 1.2 GWh of batteries per year, with an anticipated output of 7.2 million battery cells. The goal is to eventually produce 7.6 GWh per year, representative of 48 million cells.

Investment amounts:
- N/A

Project progress:
- The project has been revealed and the company was founded in February 2022. There is no specific information on the progress of the project such as signing preliminary paperwork, land purchase, or construction.

Project type:
- The project is a new build for a solid-state battery production plant, reported to be the first of its kind in the world.

Value chain stages:
- The facility covers the stages of cathode and anode manufacturing, cell fabrication, and module assembly for solid-state battery production.
